alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:09PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clark County through 645 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boyd, or 24 miles east of Eau Claire, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thorp, Greenwood, Owen, Longwood, Reseburg, Willard, Withee, Curtiss, Mead Lake, Atwood, Tioga, Eidsvold, Sterling Avenue And Starks Road, Seven Sister Mounds, The Blue Swamp, Rock Dam Lake and Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Wisconsin.
